subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Commissioner Bud Selig met for the first time with Miami city and county leaders, hoping that his influence would help the Florida Marlins’ quest for a new ballpark.
snippet: Commissioner Bud Selig met for the first time with Miami city and county leaders, hoping that his influence would help the Florida Marlins’ quest for a new ballpark.
